email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are looking to charter a vessel for a shipment of 75,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam. Could you provide us with your best freight rate and available vessel options? The laycan we are targeting is between November 10th and November 15th.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your inquiry. We have the vessel MV OCEAN STAR available for your shipment. The vessel has a DWT of 82,000 and an LOA of 225 meters. We can offer a freight rate of $25/MT on an FOB basis. The laycan is workable within your requested dates.

Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
John Doe
Global Freight Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for the prompt response. The vessel details look suitable. However, the freight rate of $25/MT is higher than what we are seeing in the market. Could you consider revising the rate to $22/MT?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

We appreciate your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we can adjust our offer to $23/MT. This is our best and final offer.

Please confirm if this is acceptable so we can proceed with the fixture.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for revising the rate. We accept your offer of $23/MT. Please proceed with the fixture for MV OCEAN STAR with the laycan of November 10th to November 15th.

Could you also confirm the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for confirming. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day pro rata. We will send the fixture recap shortly.

Best regards,
John
